author: Atom Sphere
post_text: March 30, 2020 at 4:04 PM#1Is it possible to make a macro that open the Temporary Store option window?For an onPC use where the long press don't really work?

posts.author: Atom Sphere
posts.post_text: March 30, 2020 at 4:04 PM#1Is it possible to make a macro that open the Temporary Store option window?For an onPC use where the long press don't really work?

posts.author: jfguedes
posts.post_text: March 30, 2020 at 4:45 PM#2Not to my knowledge...TypeMenu /?to view the list of options for menu

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: March 30, 2020 at 7:43 PM#3this seems to do the job:LUA "gma.canbus.hardkey(59, true, true);gma.canbus.hardkey(59, false, false)"

posts.author: Atom Sphere
posts.post_text: March 31, 2020 at 10:52 AM#4Thanks! I've looked around but it seems that the only thing accessible in the command line is the default store option...

title: Temporary Store Option
